Namespace: regions

regions

Methods for interacting with the Regions endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#regions
Source:
  • regions.js, line 1

Methods

availability(parameters)

Retrieve a list of the VPSPLANIDs currently available in this location.
If your account has special plans available, you will need to pass your API key in order to see them. For all other accounts, the API key is not required.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#regions_region_availability
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
DCID number Location to check availability.
type string <optional>
 The type of plans for which to include availability. Possible values: "all", "vc2", "ssd", "vdc2", "dedicated".
Source:
  • regions.js, line 28

availabilityBareMetal(parameters)

Retrieve a list of the METALPLANIDs currently available in this location.
If your account has special plans available, you will need to pass your API key in order to see them. For all other accounts, the API key is not required.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#regions_region_availability_baremetal
Parameters:

parameters object

Retrieve a list of the vc2 VPSPLANIDs currently available in this location.
If your account has special plans available, you will need to pass your API key in order to see them. For all other accounts, the API key is not required.

list(parameters)

Retrieve a list of all active plans. Plans that are no longer available will not be shown.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#regions_region_list
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
availability string <optional>
 'yes' or 'no'. If 'yes', include the current availability with each region entry.
Source:
  • regions.js, line 7
